compilo

Class LLVMGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • compilo.LLVMGenerator

  • public class LLVMGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class of the LLVM generator. Instanciation of this class is invoked during the parsing.

    • Field Summary

        Parameters:

        • multiplication
        • subtraction
        • addition
        • subtraction

      • subtract

        public void subtract()
        Separated from the arthimOperation(String) because S-COBOL handles the two forms of the subtraction differently. sub i32 %a, %b is a-b, but subtract a from b is b-a. This methods handles the second sort.

      • store

        public void store()

        right - Right operand
